nodes.text: Karbarr's Fortress was a modified Corellian HT-2200 medium freighter which was for sale by the Bith used space transport salesman Fiz Cor'gril.
Karbarr's Fortress boasted additional armor plating over the standard trimantium hull and deflector shields as well as upgraded SoroSuub Boav Ion Drives to compensate for the added weight.

One of this ship's original pulse laser cannons was removed to facilitate the shield upgrades, resulting in faulty wiring of the shield generator to the power core. The ship often lost power when the shields were under duress.
The ship's cargo distribution was left like in the original model, with two separate cargo holds capable to support different environmental condiitons. The total cargo capacity was 800 metric tons.
The Karbarr's Fortress was put on sale at Fizzi's Slightly Used Starships for  170,000.
